#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<time.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x);

int main()
{	
	int noOfTest;
	scanint(noOfTest);
        int arr[1001];
        arr[0]=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=1000;++i)
        {
            int x = i;
            arr[i]=0;
            for(;x;arr[i]++)x&=x-1;
            arr[i]+=arr[i-1];
        }
	for(int i=0;i<noOfTest;++i)
	{
            int val;
            scanint(val);
            printf("%d\n",arr[val]);
	}
        
    return 0;
}


void scanint(int &x)
{
	int flag=0;
	register int c = gc();
	if(c == '-') flag=1;
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
   	if(flag == 1)x=-x;
}
